GameState

Class SplashState

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameState.GameState
      • GameState.SplashState

  • public class SplashState
extends GameState
    This class accounts for the animations at the start of the program.
    Version:
    1.0 May 25th, 2014
    Author:
    Kareem Golaub

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        This method initializes the animation. The try catch structure is used to prevent any errors when opening the image and animated image files to load onto the screen.
        Specified by:
        init in class GameState
        Parameters:
        splashScreen - - Reference variable for JLabel, stores the picture.
        gif - - ImageIcon variable that stores the animated image.
        e - - reference variable for the Exception thrown.

      • update

        public void update()
        This method creates the delay to allow the animations in the splash screen.
        Specified by:
        update in class GameState
        Parameters:
        e - - reference variable for the Exception thrown.
